reviewText: This is a great DVD, only place to purchase it is Amazon, if you want to see men learning Roller Derby this is the DVD you wanna get!

My husband is in the documentary. He wanted it for Christmas. He is rolling red shirt. It's fun to watch having met all of the guys on the team from Massachusetts. Now there is a men's league. The sport for both men and women  world wide. It started with a team from mass and New York.
A great movie about the modern sport of roller derby.  Filled with roller skating, humor, good people, and interesting perspectives.  Thumbs up. ;-)
